title: Microsoft Windows Canonical Display Driver DrvStrokeAndFillPath NULL Pointer Dereference Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Microsoft Windows. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the cdd.dll driver. The issue results from dereferencing a NULL pointer. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the context of SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: Microsoft has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2021-34516
timeline:
2021-05-13 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2021-08-26 - Coordinated public release of advisory
